subject: Update from 3.8.1 to 4.1
msgSnippet: Hello, I am currently updating my test cases written in Junit 3.8.1 to 4.1. As you can guess my test case class extended the TestCase class and therefore I had
messageBody:
Hello,

I am currently updating my test cases written in Junit 3.8.1 to 4.1.
As you can guess my test case class extended the TestCase class and
therefore I had the method this.getName() available in my setUp()
method to find out which test case was invoked. Now in 4.1 I need not
to extend the TestCase class and as a result I don't have the
getName() method available. How can I find out which test case (test
method tagged with @Test) was invoked in the method tagged with
@Before (setUp)???

If this question was still asked in this forum I apologize about this.
I was looking for an answer but still haven't found any.

Thanks for any hints.

Kind regards Chris
